greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Multiplicative with a(prime(i)^k) = prime(k)^2^(i-1).
comment: This sequence has similarities with A048767.
This sequence is injective (all terms are distinct).
This sequence is a permutation of A268375.
mathematica: Array[Apply[Times, FactorInteger[#] /. {p_, k_} /; p > 1 :> Prime[k]^2^(PrimePi[p] - 1)] &, 27] /. {1, 1} -> 1 (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Aug 25 2018 *)
results.author: _Rémy Sigrist_, Aug 24 2018
